plugins.name: Components to Section
plugins.description:
Easily regroup all your master components into a section. Runs across all pages of your file

Plugin does not have UI to run.


How to use

Launch via cmd + / or go to plugin > Component to Section

Tab and choose

  1. Run on current page
  2. Run on all pages
  3. Set preferences


Preferences (User saved)

  1. Choose where to create the section (current page or new page)
  2. Choose the spacing between regrouped components


Why paid?

I'm a hobbyist and it's very difficult to write clean efficient code.

I have a day job and it's a good way to keep me motivated and work extra hours.

$2 is the cheapest a plugin can be sold on figma, I was happy with $0.99 but hey...


If this plugin starts selling regularly I will keep adding commands to make it even more powerful


Free stuff

If you are looking for free stuff, I have published two widget and they are currently used by more than 50K users


Help out ?

I'm in the London, UK and always keen to hear about fellow hackers, If you want to contribute to the plugin or have a suggestion feel free to contact me on edwardbattistini.com/contact

accepted.name: EdwardB
accepted.description: Product designer during the day. Super dad at night

plugins.tagline: Regroup all your master components to a section

plugins.name: json数据转设计稿 json to Frame
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to quickly create Figma elements by inputting JSON data, improving workflow efficiency.


Function Description

  1. Generate Figma elements through JSON input
  2. Multi-language user interface support
  3. Compatible with multi-layered frame structures
  4. Can be used together with the plugin Export Frame JSON Pro for seamless frame export and import.


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin interface and select the appropriate language.
  2. Enter or paste valid JSON data into the JSON input field.
  3. Click the “Submit JSON” button, and the plugin will generate corresponding Figma elements based on the input data.


Important Notes

  1. Ensure the JSON data is correctly formatted, or elements may not be generated properly.
  2. This plugin can be used together with Export Frame JSON Pro for quick frame import and export.


介绍

本插件允许用户通过输入 JSON 数据，快速生成 Figma 画板中的元素，提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 通过 JSON 输入生成 Figma 元素
  2. 支持多种语言的用户界面
  3. 兼容画板的多层次结构
  4. 支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件配合使用，轻松实现画板导出与导入的无缝对接。


使用方法

  1. 打开插件界面，选择适合的语言。
  2. 在 JSON 输入框中输入或粘贴有效的 JSON 数据。
  3. 点击“提交 JSON”按钮，插件将根据输入的数据生成对应的 Figma 元素。


注意事项

  1. 确保输入的 JSON 数据格式正确，否则可能无法生成元素。
  2. 该插件支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件一起使用，实现画板的快速导入导出。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Easily create Figma frames from JSON data input.

plugins.name: 路径文字 Path Text Aligner
plugins.description:
Introduction

Path Text Aligner is a Figma plugin that allows users to easily align text along any custom path, providing more flexibility and control over text placement in your design.


Function Description

  1. Aligns selected text to any vector path or shape.
  2. Adjusts text along curves, straight lines, and complex paths.
  3. Offers controls for offset and spacing to fine-tune text positioning.
  4. Supports multi-line text alignment along a path.


How to Use

  1. Select the text you want to align.
  2. Draw or select the path you want the text to follow.
  3. Run the plugin, and the text will automatically align to the path.
  4. Adjust settings for text spacing, direction, and offset to achieve the desired effect.


Notes

  1. This plugin works best with vector paths (e.g., lines or shapes).
  2. Ensure the text layer is not grouped with other objects for proper alignment.
  3. You may need to adjust font size or path curvature for optimal results.


介绍

路径文字（Path Text Aligner）是一个Figma插件，允许用户轻松地将文字沿自定义路径对齐，在设计中提供更多的灵活性和控制。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文字沿任意矢量路径或形状对齐。
  2. 支持文本在曲线、直线及复杂路径上的对齐。
  3. 提供偏移和间距控制，以微调文本的位置。
  4. 支持沿路径对齐多行文本。


使用方法

  1. 选择要对齐的文字。
  2. 绘制或选择要让文字跟随的路径。
  3. 启动插件，文字将自动沿路径对齐。
  4. 调整文本间距、方向和偏移设置，以获得理想效果。


注意事项

  1. 此插件适用于矢量路径（例如，线条或形状）。
  2. 请确保文字图层未与其他对象组合，以确保正确对齐。
  3. 根据路径曲率和字体大小调整设置，以获得最佳效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Align text along any path with ease in Figma.

使用方法

  1. 选择要对齐的文字。

plugins.name: 画板自动编号 Auto Artboard Numbering
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin automates the numbering of selected Figma artboards, allowing you to customize the naming sequence with prefixes and suffixes. It supports multiple languages, enhancing your workflow efficiency and organization.


Function Introduction

  1. Automatically numbers selected artboards in Figma.
  2. Customizable naming with prefixes and suffixes.
  3. Supports multiple languages.
  4. Two naming sequences: left-to-right then top-to-bottom, or top-to-bottom then left-to-right.


How to Use

  1. Select the artboards you want to rename.
  2. Choose your preferred naming sequence.
  3. Optionally, add a prefix or suffix.
  4. Click "Apply Naming" to rename the selected artboards.


Notes

  1. Ensure artboards are selected before applying the naming operation.
  2. The plugin temporarily disables the apply button for 2 seconds to prevent accidental multiple clicks.


介绍

本插件自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号，支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名顺序。支持多种语言，提升您的工作效率和画板管理。


功能说明

  1. 自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号。
  2. 支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名。
  3. 支持多种语言。
  4. 两种命名顺序：从左到右再从上到下，或从上到下再从左到右。


使用方法

  1. 选择需要重新命名的画板。
  2. 选择您喜欢的命名顺序。
  3. 可选地添加前缀或后缀。
  4. 点击“应用命名”重新命名选中的画板。


注意事项

  1. 请确保在应用命名操作前已选中画板。
  2. 插件会在2秒内暂时禁用应用按钮，以防止意外的多次点击。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Automate artboard numbering with custom prefixes, suffixes, and multi-language support in Figma.

plugins.name: Variables Xporter (Variables to Tailwind CSS / CSS Variables)
plugins.description:
Variables Xporter converts Figma design variables into production code, solving design-development synchronization challenges.


  1. Complete documentation
  2. GitHub repository
  3. Figma Variables template
  4. Comprehensive Figma variable organization guidelines included


📤 Export Formats

  1. Tailwind CSS V4 - New CSS-first configuration with native @theme syntax
  2. Tailwind CSS V3
  3. CSS Variables


⚙️ Core Features

  1. Multi-mode support (light/dark themes, brands, responsive, density...)
  2. Complete variable reference chain tracking
  3. Tailwind CSS opacity modifier support
  4. Smart typography variable merging
  5. Unit conversion (px/rem)
  6. Filter Tailwind default palette


💡 Use Cases

  1. Tailwind CSS projects
  2. Multi-theme applications
  3. Design system maintenance
  4. Design-development collaboration


Providing reliable variable management solutions for design systems.


---


Variables Xporter 将 Figma 设计变量转换为生产代码，解决设计开发同步问题。


  1. 完整文档
  2. GitHub 仓库
  3. Figma 变量模板
  4. Figma 变量组织建议


📤 导出格式

  1. Tailwind CSS V4 - 全新 CSS-first 配置，原生 @theme 语法
  2. Tailwind CSS V3
  3. CSS Variables


⚙️ 核心功能

  1. 多模式支持（明暗主题、品牌、响应式、密度...）
  2. 变量引用链完整追踪
  3. 支持 Tailwind CSS 不透明度修饰符
  4. 排版变量智能合并
  5. 单位转换（px/rem）
  6. 过滤 Tailwind 默认调色板


💡 适用场景

  1. Tailwind CSS 项目
  2. 多主题应用
  3. 设计系统维护
  4. 设计开发协作


为设计系统提供可靠的变量管理解决方案。
plugins.tagline: Export Figma variables to Tailwind CSS / CSS variables with multi-mode support

plugins.name: Array Canvas
plugins.description:
ArrCan.som helps you organize your Figma canvas by automatically grouping and aligning selected frames based on their layer names.

Choose your sorting direction (horizontal or vertical), set spacing, and instantly get a clean, structured layout.

Perfect for cleaning up messy canvases, reviewing repeated frames, and preparing files for hand-off.
plugins.tagline: Neatly arrange selected frames by layer name

140514.name: Array Canvas
140514.description:
ArrCan.som helps you organize your Figma canvas by automatically grouping and aligning selected frames based on their layer names.

Choose your sorting direction (horizontal or vertical), set spacing, and instantly get a clean, structured layout.

Perfect for cleaning up messy canvases, reviewing repeated frames, and preparing files for hand-off.
140514.tagline: Neatly arrange selected frames by layer name

plugins.description: Upload a photo and generate a gradient based on the photo. You can then select a shape to add the gradient to. The gradient is fully customizable once added to your Figma canvas!
plugins.tagline: Build gradients visually

plugins.name: Barcode and QR code Generator - Orca Scan
plugins.description:
Need a barcode or QR code in your Figma designs? This plugin lets you generate a variety of barcode formats instantly — including EAN, UPC, Code 128, QR, and more — using the Orca Scan API.


✅ Choose a barcode type

✅ Generate or enter your own value

✅ Add a caption (optional)

✅ Instantly preview and insert the image as SVG into your canvas


Built for speed and simplicity, this tool is perfect for UX flows, packaging designs, retail mockups, and beyond.

No account required — but if you want to track your barcodes in the real world, we’ve got you covered too. 😉

accepted.name: Orca Scan Plugins
accepted.description:
Designing the future of barcodes — one pixel at a time.
We’re a small team building smart tools to scan, create, and track with ease 🚀

plugins.tagline: Generate barcodes and QR codes directly in Figma with one click.

140410.name: Barcode and QR code Generator - Orca Scan
140410.description:
Need a barcode or QR code in your Figma designs? This plugin lets you generate a variety of barcode formats instantly — including EAN, UPC, Code 128, QR, and more — using the Orca Scan API.


✅ Choose a barcode type

✅ Add a caption (optional)

✅ Instantly preview and insert the image as SVG into your canvas


Built for speed and simplicity, this tool is perfect for UX flows, packaging designs, retail mockups, and beyond.

plugins.name: Paste Miles
plugins.description:
Select a frame, copy its width and height, then choose another frame to paste the same size instantly.

This makes it easy to match the dimensions of one frame to another without manual resizing. It’s perfect for keeping your layouts consistent and neatly aligned.

The plugin gives clear feedback as you work and only works when a single frame is selected, helping you avoid mistakes and keep everything accurate.
plugins.tagline: Easily copy the height and width of one frame and apply it to another

140581.name: Paste Miles
140581.description:
Select a frame, copy its width and height, then choose another frame to paste the same size instantly.

This makes it easy to match the dimensions of one frame to another without manual resizing. It’s perfect for keeping your layouts consistent and neatly aligned.

The plugin gives clear feedback as you work and only works when a single frame is selected, helping you avoid mistakes and keep everything accurate.
140581.tagline: Easily copy the height and width of one frame and apply it to another

140399.name: Component Loader
140399.description: Permite la re-renderización de todos los componentes dentro de la página actual donde te encuentres con el objetivo de solucionar el bug de cambio de tipografía en instancias de componente que existe en Figma
140399.release_notes:
Ahora se puede actualizar instancias de la siguiente forma:
- Al no seleccionar ningún componente se actualizaran todas las instancias
- Al seleccionar solo un componente se actualizaran solo las instancias de ese mismo
- Al seleccionar más de un componente se actualizaran todas las instancias de esos componentes electos
140399.tagline: Permite re-renderizar todos las isntancias de componentes por página del documento

plugins.name: Orshot
plugins.description:
Orshot lets you generate dynamic images from templates using API and Integrations like Zapier, Airtable etc.


With Orshot's Figma Plugin, you can import your existing Figma designs in Orshot Studio as a template. And then you can auto-generate dynamic images from that template using Rest API, SDKs and Integrations


How to use the plugin(watch demo):

  1. Select a frame or a group in Figma which you want to import in Orshot Studio
  2. While selected, run the Orshot plugin from Plugins > Orshot
  3. You'll see a window showing the JSON for the selected design
  4. Copy the JSON and paste it in Orshot Studio > Import
  5. The selected design will be replicated in Orshot Studio
  6. After saving, you can automate the template in "API & Integrations" page for the template


Learn more on Figma design automation using Rest API


Notes:

  1. Only supported layers and styles are imported
  2. Current set of supported layers: Text, Rectangle, Circle, Arrows, Images
  3. Images are imported as placeholders which you can replace in Orshot Studio


If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to send an email at hi@orshot.com
plugins.tagline: Auto-Generate Images from your Figma Designs via API and Integrations

140448.description:

140448.release_notes: - added support for font weight for text elements
140448.tagline: Auto-Generate Images from your Figma Designs via API and Integrations

plugins.name: FigCopy-Node
plugins.description:
FigCopy-Node is a smart, bidirectional plugin for Figma that bridges the gap between designers and developers.


With a single click, you can:


🎯 Extract clean, readable code from Figma layers, groups, or frames


🔄 Paste the code back into the plugin to recreate your design inside Figma


⚡ Boost your design-to-dev workflow with consistency and speed


Whether you're building components, iterating fast, or handing off to devs,FigCopy-Node keeps your design and code in sync—both ways.
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma designs to code and back—seamlessly. Design, copy, paste, regenerate.

140075.name: FigCopy-Node
140075.description:

🎯 Extract clean, readable code from Figma layers, groups, or frames

⚡ Boost your design-to-dev workflow with consistency and speed


Whether you're building components, iterating fast, or handing off to devs,FigCopy-Node keeps your design and code in sync—both ways.
140075.tagline: Convert Figma designs to code and back—seamlessly. Design, copy, paste, regenerate.

plugins.name: Quick Edit
plugins.description:
Quick Edit: Your Floating Toolkit for Figma Productivity


Quick Edit is a lightweight Figma plugin designed to supercharge your design workflow. It adds a convenient floating toolbar to your canvas, providing instant access to essential actions like Copy, Paste, Cut, Delete, and Clone. Streamline repetitive tasks with one-click precision, enhancing your focus without interruption.


Enjoy smart positioning that places pasted and cloned items intelligently relative to your selection or at the viewport's center. With a persistent copied state across operations and a minimal, responsive UI, Quick Edit ensures your most common design actions are always just a click away.
plugins.tagline: Finally, Easy Copy/Paste on Figma Touchscreens. Design without limits.

140069.name: Quick Edit
140069.description:
Quick Edit: Your Floating Toolkit for Figma Productivity


Quick Edit is a lightweight Figma plugin designed to supercharge your design workflow. It adds a convenient floating toolbar to your canvas, providing instant access to essential actions like Copy, Paste, Cut, Delete, and Clone. Streamline repetitive tasks with one-click precision, enhancing your focus without interruption.


Enjoy smart positioning that places pasted and cloned items intelligently relative to your selection or at the viewport's center. With a persistent copied state across operations and a minimal, responsive UI, Quick Edit ensures your most common design actions are always just a click away.
140069.tagline: Finally, Easy Copy/Paste on Figma Touchscreens. Design without limits.

plugins.name: Unify Path Directions
plugins.description:
If you’ve ever mirrored and then joined open vector paths and noticed weird behavior at the end caps with variable stroke widths, this plugin fixes it.


It ensures all vector paths run in the same direction, as if they were drawn in one go with the pen tool.


Instructions:

  1. Select the vector shape
  2. Run the plugin
  3. Set your preferred end cap and join properties (running the plugin resets them)
plugins.tagline: Fix variable stroke width glitches by aligning vector path directions

140074.name: Unify Path Directions
140074.description:

140074.tagline: Fix variable stroke width glitches by aligning vector path directions

plugins.name: VisualCompare
plugins.description:
VisualCompare helps you instantly detect visual and layout changes between two selected Figma frames or components.

Whether you're reviewing designs, documenting updates, or double-checking changes — VisualCompare shows you pixel-level differences in:


Position and size


Fonts, spacing, and text styles


Colors, shadows, layout mode, paddings


Everything that impacts design, visually.


🔍 Select 2 layers → Click “Compare” → Get a beautiful VisualCompare.
plugins.tagline: Instantly See What Changed. Pixel to Property.

140040.name: VisualCompare
140040.description:
VisualCompare helps you instantly detect visual and layout changes between two selected Figma frames or components.

Whether you're reviewing designs, documenting updates, or double-checking changes — VisualCompare shows you pixel-level differences in:


Position and size


Fonts, spacing, and text styles


Colors, shadows, layout mode, paddings


Everything that impacts design, visually.


🔍 Select 2 layers → Click “Compare” → Get a beautiful VisualCompare.
140040.tagline: Instantly See What Changed. Pixel to Property.

plugins.name: Variantor
plugins.description:
Variantor is a powerful tool that allows you to quickly and easily generate multiple icon sizes from a single source. It automates the process of scaling and adjusting the outline for each size, saving time and simplifying work on UI kits and design systems.


What can Variantor do?

  1. Custom sizes and outline thickness

You can set your own size and outline thickness for each icon version, and Variantor will generate all the options in seconds, freeing you from tedious manual work.

  1. Quick color change

Variantor provides the ability to change fill and stroke colors for all icons at once, which is useful when creating branded color palettes.

  1. Flexible component settings

Adjust the margins and spacing of your component to improve its visual appearance. This will make it look more balanced and attractive.

  1. Simple and intuitive interface

Add, edit, or delete properties in just a couple of clicks. This plugin is useful for both novice designers and professionals working with extensive icon libraries.


Variantor is open source and available on GitHub.
plugins.tagline: Plugin for creating multiple icon sizes from a single icon

140245.description:

You can set your own size and outline thickness for each icon version, and Variantor will generate all the options in seconds, freeing you from tedious manual work.

  1. Quick color change

Variantor provides the ability to change fill and stroke colors for all icons at once, which is useful when creating branded color palettes.

140245.tagline: Plugin for creating multiple icon sizes from a single icon

plugins.name: R.N.A Proto
plugins.description:
R.N.A Proto is a Figma plugin that instantly transforms your designs into fully interactive, pixel-perfect Instagram carousel prototypes.


Create shareable links in a single click that look and feel exactly like the real Instagram app. It's the perfect tool for getting realistic feedback from user testing, and for impressing clients and stakeholders with high-fidelity presentations that work flawlessly on any device.


How It Works


Select Your Frames: Choose the frames you want in your carousel directly on the Figma canvas.


Add a Caption (Optional): Name a text layer "caption" and its content will be automatically used.


Click Publish: The plugin handles the rest, giving you a shareable link in seconds.


Key Features


Pixel-Perfect Realism: Your prototypes are indistinguishable from the live Instagram UI, from the header and icons down to the pagination dots.


Interactive Video Support: Don't just show images. Add .mp4 files to your frames to create prototypes with auto-playing video, just like a real post.


Dynamic and Live: The plugin uses a responsive, three-state UI. It provides helpful prompts when you start, live-updates as you select frames, and gives you a clear success screen when you're done.


One-Click Workflow: No complicated setup or configuration. Select your frames and publish. It’s that simple.



Perfect For


User Testing: Get authentic feedback by letting users interact with a prototype that feels real.


Client & Stakeholder Reviews: Share a link that anyone can open on their phone or desktop, without needing access to Figma.


Portfolio Pieces: Showcase your work in a dynamic, high-fidelity format.
plugins.tagline: Shareable, Interactive Instagram Protoypes

139984.name: R.N.A Proto
139984.description:

Create shareable links in a single click that look and feel exactly like the real Instagram app. It's the perfect tool for getting realistic feedback from user testing, and for impressing clients and stakeholders with high-fidelity presentations that work flawlessly on any device.


How It Works


Select Your Frames: Choose the frames you want in your carousel directly on the Figma canvas.


Add a Caption (Optional): Name a text layer "caption" and its content will be automatically used.


Click Publish: The plugin handles the rest, giving you a shareable link in seconds.


Key Features


Pixel-Perfect Realism: Your prototypes are indistinguishable from the live Instagram UI, from the header and icons down to the pagination dots.


Interactive Video Support: Don't just show images. Add .mp4 files to your frames to create prototypes with auto-playing video, just like a real post.


Dynamic and Live: The plugin uses a responsive, three-state UI. It provides helpful prompts when you start, live-updates as you select frames, and gives you a clear success screen when you're done.


One-Click Workflow: No complicated setup or configuration. Select your frames and publish. It’s that simple.

plugins.name: G-code generation | GRBL/Marlin lasers
plugins.description:
This project is a Figma plugin that allows users to convert their vector designs into G-code suitable for laser cutting and engraving with Marlin firmware.


The community can find a powerful tool that bridges the gap between design and manufacturing, enabling a seamless workflow from Figma to a physical product.


Developers can learn from the modern tech stack, which includes React, Vite, and TypeScript, and explore the intricacies of Figma plugin development and G-code generation.


Makers and hobbyists can benefit from the simplified process of creating G-code without needing specialized CAM software.


Ultimately, this open-source project serves as a valuable resource for designers, developers, and enthusiasts to learn, collaborate, and innovate at the intersection of design and digital fabrication.


https://github.com/kriku/figma-gcode-plugin
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma designs into G-code for laser cutting and engraving with Marlin firmware!

139404.name: G-code generation | GRBL/Marlin lasers
139404.description:
This project is a Figma plugin that allows users to convert their vector designs into G-code suitable for laser cutting and engraving with Marlin firmware.


The community can find a powerful tool that bridges the gap between design and manufacturing, enabling a seamless workflow from Figma to a physical product.


Developers can learn from the modern tech stack, which includes React, Vite, and TypeScript, and explore the intricacies of Figma plugin development and G-code generation.


Makers and hobbyists can benefit from the simplified process of creating G-code without needing specialized CAM software.


Ultimately, this open-source project serves as a valuable resource for designers, developers, and enthusiasts to learn, collaborate, and innovate at the intersection of design and digital fabrication.


https://github.com/kriku/figma-gcode-plugin
139404.tagline: Convert your Figma designs into G-code for laser cutting and engraving with Marlin firmware!

plugins.name: Moboo - Import Figma
plugins.description:
Moboo est une plateforme no-code qui te permet de créer une application mobile à partir de ton design Figma, sans écrire une seule ligne de code.


Grâce à ce plugin, tu peux :

•🔗 Connecter ton compte Moboo

•📥 Importer automatiquement tes écrans Figma dans Moboo

•🚀 Transformer ton design en une app mobile interactive


Moboo te permet ensuite de personnaliser ton app avec un éditeur visuel, d’ajouter des interactions, et bientôt… de la publier directement sur l’App Store ou le Play Store ✨


Ce plugin est idéal pour les designers, product builders, étudiants et startups qui veulent créer rapidement des MVPs ou des apps internes sans compétence technique.


👉 Tu as besoin d’un compte gratuit sur https://lp.moboo.app/

plugins.name: Assumely
plugins.description:
Track assumptions across all your Figma projects and make better decisions, faster.

Assumely helps you validate ideas and avoid costly mistakes, no matter what you're building.


Capture every assumption directly in your Figma files, keeping everything organized in one place. Assumptions added in Figma automatically sync with the free Assumely web app, where you can set confidence levels, importance, and research due dates. You can also assign tasks, comment on progress, and collaborate with your team.
plugins.tagline: Track assumptions across all your Figma projects and make better decisions, faster.

plugins.name: Export-Dims
plugins.description:
With either a single mock or multiple mocks, this plugin lets you grab dimensions, scaled or raw, for mock elements. If the mock elements don't exist, custom regions can be created and defined.


Much of the calculations are based on what's needed to incorporate mocks into a Qualtrics workflow, particularly one that uses sticky headers. For more on that implementation and how to use the data from this plugin in your pipeline please reach out to terrencepope@.
plugins.tagline: Quickly grab dimensions for Figma frames and nodes.

138387.name: Export-Dims
138387.description:
With either a single mock or multiple mocks, this plugin lets you grab dimensions, scaled or raw, for mock elements. If the mock elements don't exist, custom regions can be created and defined.


Much of the calculations are based on what's needed to incorporate mocks into a Qualtrics workflow, particularly one that uses sticky headers. For more on that implementation and how to use the data from this plugin in your pipeline please reach out to terrencepope@.
138387.release_notes: Cleaned up the code to be more readable
138387.tagline: Quickly grab dimensions for Figma frames and nodes.

plugins.name: Toko
plugins.description:
Toko – Bridge your Figma “source-of-truth” tokens straight into code


Bring your design system to life without any copy-&-paste errors. With Toko you can:


1. Export any Figma token set

• Colors, typography, spacing, radius, etc.

• Output as:


• CSS variables

• JSON objects

• JavaScript modules

• Tailwind CSS config


2. Generate CSS classes from text styles

• Automatically map your Figma text styles into CSS class names.

• No hand-writing class names—just pick your style library and go.


3. Push updates directly to GitHub

• Connect a repo in a few clicks

• Keep your token files in sync with every Figma change


4. Flexible export options

• Copy to clipboard

• Download ready-to-use files

• Push to your Repo using PAT


---


Why you’ll love Toko


One-click workflow: Stay in Figma—no jumping between apps.

Design–developer alignment: Ship the exact values your designers approved.

Always up-to-date: Version your tokens alongside your code.

Team-ready: Invite collaborators, lock down your design system, and roll out across projects.


Ready to stop manual syncing and start shipping design tokens as code? Install Toko and transform your Figma styles into production-ready assets today!
plugins.tagline: Toko converts Figma design tokens into ready CSS, JSON, JS, or Tailwind code, exporting to GitHub!!!

plugins.name: Dialekt
plugins.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
plugins.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

plugins.name: Frame Select Helper
plugins.description:
Supports repeatedly selecting the same group of frames by adding a mark (frame name suffix) to the selected frames.


If you copy and paste the selected frames from this tool onto another page, you can export only the targeted frames to a single PDF file by clicking “File” -> “Export frames to PDF”!


選択したフレームにマーク（フレーム名の接尾辞）を付けて、繰り返し同じフレーム群を選択することをサポートします。

このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます。


使い方

初回：選択対象にしたいフレームをマークする


Figmaのフレーム名に`--sfh-target`を付与する

これは手動で、またはフレームを選択した状態でプラグインを起動して"選択フレームを対象にマーク"を押すことで行う


2回目以降：フレームを一括選択する

  1. プラグインを起動する
  2. "すべて選択・解除"を押すと、マークしたフレームがすべて選択される


このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます
plugins.tagline: Selection helper for those who want to repeatedly select the same frame for PDF export, etc.

plugins.name: KColor.co
plugins.description:
KColor.co – The Free Smartest Color Tool for Designers

Create or get inspired with beautiful, accessible color palettes – all inside Figma. KColor.co brings essential tools into one sleek plugin:


Palette Generator: Instantly generate harmonious color sets in multiple modes (shades, tints, gradients, monochrome or Tailwind).


Contrast Checker: Test color combinations against WCAG 3 (APCA) standards to ensure readability and accessibility.


Color Blindness Simulator: See how your designs appear to users with different types of color blindness.


Export palettes to styles, variables or other formats.


Whether you are whipping up a fresh design or polishing the final pixels, KColor.co helps you work faster, smarter, and with accessibility baked in.


Find out more about how you can get the best out of this plugin.
plugins.tagline: The Free Smartest Color Tool for Designers

plugins.name: Copy Exporter
plugins.description: Copy Exporter streamlines the process of extracting text content from your Figma designs. Ideal for copywriters, editors, and localization teams, it converts frame-based text into structured CSVs or Excel workbooks—perfect for external editing, review, or translation workflows.
plugins.tagline: Export copy from your figma pages with clarity.

139033.name: Copy Exporter
139033.description: Copy Exporter streamlines the process of extracting text content from your Figma designs. Ideal for copywriters, editors, and localization teams, it converts frame-based text into structured CSVs or Excel workbooks—perfect for external editing, review, or translation workflows.
139033.tagline: Export copy from your figma pages with clarity.

plugins.name: 文案提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer
plugins.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quickly extract and replace text in bulk with ease

plugins.name: Frozti.io
plugins.description: Generate React components with predictable, usable code that you can customize to your exact needs. Choose your preferred UI frameworks, packages, and styling libraries to create components that fit seamlessly into your existing codebase. Unlike other generators, Frozti.io gives you full control over the output while generating useful and predictable code.

plugins.name: Text Transfer
plugins.description: It is often necessary to copy and past text into certain elements in the design. I couldn't find a plugin that allows this to be done quickly and easily, so I decided to create one. It enables you to select multiple elements, copy the text, and paste him into other elements one by one.
plugins.tagline: The plugin allows you to quickly copy text from one element and paste it into another.
